pages.text: The Cleansing Potion is used to clear insanity. Here's how it works:$(br2)$(l)If you have temporary insanity:$()$(br)$(li)50% chance: cure temporary insanity$(br)$(li)50% chance: raise insanity by 10%
$(l)If you have permanent insanity:$()$(br)$(li)1% chance: cure permanent insanity$(br)$(li)99% chance: kill the player and do nothing else
